title: My patch will not download,HELP
body:
My patch will run through its file scan and gets to about 850 files and then an error pops up saying (error 004) i have read up on it and done the whole right click on window and say no 2-3  times and then it will work. But all it does it makes the patch files rescan it will get to around 850files again and then restart.

How do i fix this?

replies.body: I'm not sure what steps you've taken specifically, but this error may be due to a connection problem that can't reach the patching server to grab updates.  If you close out the patcher before while it's trying to patch, then restarting it will cause it to rescan all of your files for corruption.  Your best bet is to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fix this up.  Then let the patcher scan all of your files, so it can continue on to patch.  I hope that helps!
Also thank you riot for your help the final solution at the end of the day i copied the entire game off my friends PC thank you for the help you provided and enjoy your day

I have no idea what the problem is the first time i did the patch it went to about 2% and now it wont even get through the file scan im situated in South Africa and ive had the game before but uninstalled it because i just didnt have the time to play
